definition: thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: It is an old film but it is very good.
Here is the form for the X-rays. See you later.
sentences.chinese: 这是拍片子的单子，一会儿见。

sentences.english: I thought it was about a girl who hungers for love.
sentences.chinese: 我以为是有关一个女孩渴望爱情的片子。

sentences.english: You must have your arm X-rayed.
sentences.chinese: 你的胳膊需要照一个X光片子。

sentences.english: So let's say you're in a movie theater and you're watching a fantastic movie,
sentences.chinese: 假设你正在电影院，你正在看一部特别棒的片子。

sentences.english: He has chosen a DVD to rent and is now at the counter.
sentences.chinese: 有这些折价券，你可以一片的价钱租两部片子。

sentences.english: Did you start editing before having completed shooting three films?
sentences.chinese: 您在三部片子杀青前就开始剪接了吗？

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the method of manufactures the high quality LCT fluid basal cell study flat and thin piece.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨如何制作优质的LCT液基细胞学片子。

sentences.english: This is a old film, but very good.
She told me that she had just finished a new movie.
sentences.chinese: 她告诉我她刚拍完一部新片子。

sentences.english: We also bought lots of cheap DVDs from the markets in UBUD.
sentences.chinese: 我们还从乌布市场上买了很多便宜的DVD片子。

sentences.english: “Andrew's hut was broken into and some film was stolen,” she said.
sentences.chinese: 安德鲁的棚屋被破门而入，一些片子被偷了。

sentences.english: There are many news films releases.
sentences.chinese: 有许多新的片子要首映。

sentences.english: It was more than one year ago when I heard about the preparation of this movie.
sentences.chinese: 记得刚听说片子筹拍的消息时，是一年多以前。

sentences.english: Unless it sucked, then I might be offended.
sentences.chinese: 除非片子拍的太烂了，我才可能会生气。

sentences.english: And they were good longer- some of them were even better longer.
sentences.chinese: 加长版的其实也不错，有些甚至好过实际播出的片子。

definition: opening titles (of movie)/leader (blank film at the beginning and end of a reel)
